channel.title: Other on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Rob Barry

item.title: Regulatory Breakdowns in Oversight of U.S. Stockbrokers
item.description: Over the past two years, The Wall Street Journal has worked to obtain, organize and analyze data about the employment and disciplinary histories of the more than 630,000 stockbrokers in America. This paper details how that process was performed, as well as some of the reporters’ findings. Read it here.

item.title: From Casual Conversation to Massive Investigation
item.description: The Wall Street Journal series on executive trading began with a casual conversation between one of the reporters and a long-time source. Read the full story here.
